markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Spriggan](/Traits.aspx?ID=309)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 310 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Kin to gnomes, spriggans tend to be evil and can grow in size to resemble giants.
name: Spriggan
